虥字的基本解释

虥
zhàn
古同“虦”。

虥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《廣韻》士諫切，去諫，崇。］
［《廣韻》士限切，上産，崇。］
［《廣韻》昨閑切，平山，從。］
亦作“虦1”。
虎之浅毛者。

虥字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　虥； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1075第31
【唐韻】【集韻】士限切【韻會】士版切，?音棧。【玉篇】貓也，字亦作虦。【爾雅·釋獸】虎竊毛謂之虦貓。【韓愈詩】下言人吏稀，唯足彪與虥。　又【廣韻】昨閑切，音孱。士諫切，音輚。義?同。

虥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
虥字的起名意思

暂无。

虥
zhàn
Gu Tong "Yu".
虥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàn］
["Guangyun" scholars admonish, go admonish, and worship. ]
["Guangyun" scholars limit cutting, high production, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" was freely cut yesterday, Hirayama, from. ]
Also known as "虦1".
The tiger's light hair.
虥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Xiao Zi Department] 　虥; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1075 31
[Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Limited cut for scholars [Yunhui] Cut for scholars,? Yinzhan. [Jade articles] The cat also has the words as yin. 【Erya·Shi Beast】The tiger stealing hair is called a nasty cat. [Han Yu Poems] The next word is rare, but only sturdy and cuddly.　[Guangyun] I cut yesterday at leisure, sound. Shi Jian cuts, and the sound is cut. Righteous? Same.
